actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to include the holders of star route and certain other contracts for the carrying of mail under the provisions of the Civil Service Retirement Act.

summary.text: Includes the holders of star route, water route, mail messenger, panel body, screen panel, or screen wagon contracts for the carrying of mail under the provisions of the Civil Service Retirement Act.

titles.title: A bill to include the holders of star route and certain other contracts for the carrying of mail under the provisions of the Civil Service Retirement Act.
